Container.Name: rimgo
Container.Overview:
Alternative Imgur front-end
This requires the addition of a config.yml file within the /mnt/user/appdata/rimgo directory. Before starting the container for the first time run these commands within the terminal mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/rimgo cd /mnt/user/appdata/rimgo nano config.yml
Copy in the config.yml contents located from https://codeberg.org/video-prize-ranch/rimgo/src/branch/main/config.yml Save, close and run the container
